name: ripcurl-theme
description: Modern WordPress block theme with SCSS, custom blocks, and build automation.

scripts.build: npm run build:scss && npm run build:blocks
scripts.build:scss: sass scss/style.scss style.css --no-source-map --style=compressed && sass scss/editor.scss editor-style.css --no-source-map --style=compressed
scripts.start:scss: sass scss/style.scss style.css --watch --no-source-map --style=compressed & sass scss/editor.scss editor-style.css --watch --no-source-map --style=compressed
